tags.name: img-view-modal
tags.description:
`img-view-modal`
Layers images over each other with a slider interface to compare them

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `top-src` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `bottom-src` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `opacity` {`boolean`} - mode for the slider: wipe

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `topSrc` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `bottomSrc` {`string`} - src for top image

  * `opacity` {`boolean`} - mode for the slider: wipe

attributes.name: top-src
attributes.description:
`top-src` {`string`} - src for top image

Property: topSrc

attributes.name: bottom-src
attributes.description:
`bottom-src` {`string`} - src for top image

Property: bottomSrc

attributes.name: opacity
attributes.description:
`opacity` {`boolean`} - mode for the slider: wipe

Property: opacity

Default: false

tags.name: img-view-viewer
tags.description: `img-view-viewer` Combines img-pan-zoom and simple-modal for an easy image zoom solution ### Styling Custom property | Description | Default ----------------|-------------|---------- `--img-view-viewer-height` | viewer height | 500px `--img-view-viewer-backgroundColor` | background color | white `--img-view-viewer-color` | text color | black `--img-view-viewer-borderColor` | border color | #ddd `--img-view-viewer-toggled-backgroundColor` | background color of toggled buttons and kbd commands | #eee Events: * `toolbar-button-click` - Fires when constructed, so that parent radio group can listen for it. Attributes: * `figures` {`any[]`} - * `info-mode` {`boolean`} - whether info mode is toggled * `keyboard-help-mode` {`boolean`} - whether keyboard shortcuts help mode is toggled * `toolbars` - if used with multiple images and paged navigation, index of current item * `__screenfullLoaded` {`boolean`} - Properties: * `figures` {`any[]`} - * `infoToggled` {`boolean`} - whether info mode is toggled * `kbdToggled` {`boolean`} - whether keyboard shortcuts help mode is toggled * `toolbars` - if used with multiple images and paged navigation, index of current item * `homebutton` - default home button configuration * `fullscreenbutton` - default toggle fullscreen button configuration * `fullscreenTarget` - element to make fullscreen, can be overidden * `navigatorbutton` - default toggle navigate window button configuration Uses Viewport Navigator * `infobutton` - default toggle info button configuration * `kbdbutton` - default toggle keyboard shorcuts help button configuration * `flipbutton` - default flip horizontal button configuration * `rotategroup` - default rotate button group configuration * `rotateccwbutton` - default rotate counterclockwise button configuration * `rotatecwbutton` - default rotate counter button configuration * `pangroup` - default pan button group configuration * `panleftbutton` - default pan left button configuration * `panupbutton` - default pan up button configuration * `pandownbutton` - default pan down button configuration * `panrightbutton` - default pan right button configuration * `zoomgroup` - default zoom button group configuration * `zoominbutton` - default zoom in button configuration * `zoomoutbutton` - default zoom out button configuration * `prevbutton` - default prev button configuration * `nextbutton` - default next button configuration * `pages` - * `noSources` {`void`} - * `prevDisabled` {`boolean`} - * `nextDisabled` {`boolean`} - * `info` - * `pageXofY` {`string`} - default x of y text for toolbar * `navXofY` {`{ id: string; type: string; contents: TemplateResult; }`} - * `defaultToolbars` - default toolbar config object, where "top" contains config for toolbar above image(s), and "bottom" contains config for toolbar above image(s) * `src` - * `loadSrc` - * `sources` - * `minZoomImageRatio` {`number`} - * `maxZoomPixelRatio` {`number`} - * `__screenfullLoaded` {`boolean`} -

attributes.description:

Property: infoToggled

attributes.name: toolbars
attributes.description:

Property: toolbars

attributes.name: ontoolbar-button-click
attributes.description: `toolbar-button-click` - Fires when constructed, so that parent radio group can listen for it.

tags.name: img-view-modal
tags.description:
`img-view-modal`
Combines img-pan-zoom and simple-modal for an easy image zoom solution

### Styling

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--img-view-modal-width` | sets width of modal | 90%
`--img-view-modal-height` | sets height of modal | 90vh
`--img-view-modal-backgroundColor` | background color | white
`--img-view-modal-color` | text color | black
`--img-view-modal-borderColor` | border color | #ddd
`--img-view-modal-toggled-backgroundColor` | background color of toggled buttons and kbd commands | #eee

Events:

  * `modal-button-click` - 

  * `simple-modal-show` - 

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - 

  * `modal` - 

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - 

  * `modal` -
